barrier_id.desc: The ID of the barrier you're trying to modify.

barriered_from_usergroup_ids.desc: A list of [IDP Groups](https://slack.com/help/articles/115001435788-Connect-identity-provider-groups-to-your-Enterprise-organization) ids that the primary usergroup is to be barriered from.

restricted_subjects.desc: What kind of interactions are blocked by this barrier? For v1, we only support a list of all 3, eg `im, mpim, call`.

errors.barrier_already_exists: There already exists another barrier restricting activity between two or more of your requested usergroups.
errors.barrier_not_found: The barrier you're trying to update cannot be found.
errors.barriered_from_usergroups_not_found: One or more of the ids passed in for barriered_from_usergroup_ids can’t be found.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The information barrier feature is not enabled, please reach out to your CSM.
errors.invalid_restricted_subjects: The restricted subjects provided are invalid or not currently supported.
errors.not_an_admin: The token provided is not associated with an org admin.
errors.primary_usergroup_not_found: The id passed in for primary_usergroup_id can’t be found.
